paragraphs.body: Welcome to the Avatar Wiki Fanon Awards!
paragraphs.text: Welcome to the Avatar Wiki Fanon Awards!

paragraphs.body: The Avatar Wiki Fanon Awards are awards designed to acknowledge outstanding achievements on the fanon portal and recognize the hard work of fan fiction authors. They are run like any other award ceremony, nominated and voted for by the Avatar Wiki Community. The ${link_0} makes sure every ceremony runs as smooth as possible.
paragraphs.text: The Avatar Wiki Fanon Awards are awards designed to acknowledge outstanding achievements on the fanon portal and recognize the hard work of fan fiction authors. They are run like any other award ceremony, nominated and voted for by the Avatar Wiki Community. The Fanon Awards Council makes sure every ceremony runs as smooth as possible.

paragraphs.body: The Seventh Fanon Awards ceremony will take place in 2016.
paragraphs.text: The Seventh Fanon Awards ceremony will take place in 2016.

paragraphs.body: These are the current Fanon Awards categories. They are subject to change based on the availability of applicable fanons each year.
